meanings.definition: A person who advocates for solidarity among individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The solidarists in our community work together to support those in need.
meanings.sent2: The solidarists organized a fundraiser to help the local homeless shelter.
meanings.sent3: The solidarists decided to throw a big party to raise money for charity.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, the solidarists emerge as beacons of unity and support.
meanings.sent5: The image of the solidarists joining hands in solidarity will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of a group of individuals advocating for solidarity.
meanings.sent1: She admired the solidarists' commitment to helping each other.
meanings.sent2: The community center was a hub of solidarists working towards common goals.
meanings.sent3: The solidarists' potluck dinners always brought smiles and full bellies.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the solidarists was as unbreakable as steel.
meanings.sent5: The solidarists' actions spoke louder than any words could.

meanings.definition: The belief in or practice of solidarity among individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: Solidarists believe that together, we can achieve great things.
meanings.sent2: The concept of solidarists supporting one another is at the core of their philosophy.
meanings.sent3: The solidarists' motto is 'United we stand, divided we fall.'
meanings.sent4: In a world full of division, the solidarists stand out as beacons of unity.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of solidarity among the solidarists is truly inspiring.
